name.title: Name
name.description: Name typically used to refer to the Outcome Fund

host_institution_of_outcome_fund.title: Host institution of Outcome Fund
host_institution_of_outcome_fund.description: Name of organistion acting as host or administrative lead for the Outcome Fund

mechanism.title: Mechanism
mechanism.description: The mechanism should describe the 'how' of the outcomes fund - i.e. the means by which the Outcomes Fund will achieve the Fund objective/purpose.

expression_of_interest.title: Expression of interest
expression_of_interest.description: Announcement date/date Expression of Interest launched for the Outcome Fund

launch_date.title: Launch date
launch_date.description: Earliest date when an outcomes contract supported by this Fund was signed

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Stated policy objective of the Outcomes Fund. e.g. improved learning outcomes for target population or to promote the adoption of outcomes-based approaches amongst local government commissioners.

primary_sdg_goal.title: Primary SDG goal
primary_sdg_goal.description: Primary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the fund is based. To be selected from the 17 SDGs defined in the United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015) https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the fund level. This is also captured at the project level]

secondary_sdg_goals.title: Secondary SDG goals
secondary_sdg_goals.description: Secondary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the fund is based. Primary SDG Goal must not be included in this variable. [This is at the fund level. This is also captured at the project level]

primary_sdg_target.title: Primary SDG target
primary_sdg_target.description: This variable identifies what primary SGD target the fund is addressing. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the fund level. This is also captured at the project level]

secondary_sdg_targets.title: Secondary SDG targets
secondary_sdg_targets.description: This variable identifies what secondary SGD target the fund is addressing. Primary SDG target must not be included in this variable. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the fund level. This is also captured at the project level]

target_population.title: Target population
target_population.description: Description of the population targeted by the fund and any eligibility requirement for the cohort of people who are to be offered support.

targeted_number_service_users_or_benefic.title: Targeted number of unique service users or beneficiaries (total)
targeted_number_service_users_or_benefic.description: Intended number of individuals in the target population who will be engaged in the service/intervention and/or whose social outcomes will be evaluated for outcome contract payment calculation.

unit_type_targeted_service_users_or_bene.title: Unit type of targeted service users or beneficiaries
unit_type_targeted_service_users_or_bene.description: Description of the unit of measurement that is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries.

unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.title: Unit description of targeted service user or beneficiaries
unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.description: This field will only be completed if the answer to the last variable was “other”. This variable identifies what type of unit of measurement is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used to describe the size of Outcome Fund

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Ambition for maximum funding available from the Outcome Fund (to be made for outcome payments directly or assistance to support the development of outcome-contracts)

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Ambition for maximum funding available from the Outcome Fund (to be made for outcome payments directly or assistance to support the development of outcome-contracts)in USD. (Conversion by INDIGO using World Bank exchange rate of the moment of expression of interest. If there is no data on dates of expression of interest, then we will use the exchange rate of the launch date)

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Actual size of funding available from the Outcome Fund (to be made for outcome payments directly or assistance to support the development of outcome-contracts)

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Actual size of funding available from the Outcome Fund (to be made for outcome payments directly or assistance to support the development of outcome-contracts)in USD. (Conversion by INDIGO using World Bank exchange rate of the moment of expression of interest. If there is no data on dates of expression of interest, then we will use the exchange rate of the launch date)

total_value_of_repayable_investment_link.title: Total value of repayable investment linked to Outcome Fund

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used to describe the size of repayable investment

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Ambition for value of repayable investment associated with the Outcome Fund (i.e., the value of repayable investment committed to resultant Impact Bond projects)

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Ambition for value of repayable investment associated with the Outcome Fund in USD (i.e., the value of repayable investment committed to resultant Impact Bond projects)

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Actual value of repayable investment associated with the Outcome Fund (i.e., the value of repayable investment committed to resultant Impact Bond projects)

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Actual value of repayable investment associated with the Outcome Fund in USD (i.e., the value of repayable investment made available to resultant Impact Bond projects)

aspiration.title: Aspiration
aspiration.description: Aspired number of distinct outcomes contracts to be supported by the Outcome Fund

actual.title: Actual
actual.description: Resulting number of distinct outcomes contracts supported by the Outcome Fund

aspiration.title: Aspiration
aspiration.description: Aspired number of funder organisations contributing to outcome payments (e.g. a few large donor institutions or lots of local government actors?)

actual.title: Actual
actual.description: Actual number of funder organisations contributing to outcome payments

aspiration.title: Aspiration
aspiration.description: Aspired number of institutions who are putting capital at risk as investors across the Outcome Fund (or rather projects supported by the Outcome Fund?) as a whole

actual.title: Actual
actual.description: Actual number of institutions who are putting capital at risk as investors across the Outcome Fund (or rather projects supported by the Outcome Fund?) as a whole

country.title: Country
country.description: Country within which the Outcome Fund allocates funds. It could be more than one country.

value.title: (Value)
value.codelistDescription: A 2 character country code from ISO 3166. Eg: GB, US

value.title: (Value)
value.patternHint: Enter a date in format YYYY, YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD
